instructions: I shall read to you a number of characteristics that belong to a particular person. Please listen to them carefully and try to form an impression of the kind of person described. You will later be asked to give a brief characterization of the person in just a few sentences.

items.question: To what extent does the person possess the quality 'generous'?
To what extent does the person possess the quality 'happy'?
To what extent does the person possess the quality 'humorous'?
To what extent does the person possess the quality 'popular'?
To what extent does the person possess the quality 'sociable'?
